short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimusways seamlessly optimizes payments processing for merchants that use QuickBooks Online

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Optimusways serves as a virtual point-of-sale terminal that operates within QuickBooks Online and has the potential to replace the requirement of a physical POS terminal for Merchants. Moreover, Merchants have the option of incorporating Optimusways into their payment processing systems without the need to change their current payment processor.

Some of the key features include:
- Credit/Debit Card Processing
- ACH Processing
- Batch Payments
- Split Payments
- Recurring Payments
- Email Invoice to Customer
- Receive Customer Payment
- Store Card and ACH Profiles
- Surcharge Fee
- Customer Portal

Customer notification options include payment completion notifications, payment due and overdue reminders, as well as recurring invoice creation notifications.

We would like to assure you that we do not collect any user-specific data, and we do not utilize any external code that might compromise your security. Our top priority is to respect your privacy and to ensure that we do not perform any actions without your consent. You can trust that we will take all necessary precautions to keep your information secure.

We are dedicated to delivering exceptional customer service at our company. Our support team is committed to providing you with the highest level of assistance and ensuring that you receive prompt and effective solutions to your inquiries. We take pride in our customer-centric approach and will work tirelessly to assist you whenever you need it. Please feel free to contact us if you require any assistance or have any queries about our product.

Please be aware that Optimusways is an independent service and is not affiliated with Intuit, Inc., the company that owns and manages QuickBooks. However, Optimusways seamlessly integrates with QuickBooks Online, making it an excellent payment processing solution for businesses of all sizes.
